title: Guy Fieri!!
description:
Guy Fieri is a celebrity chef, restaurateur, TV host, producer, and owner of many fine muscle cars. His breakout hit was hosting "Diners, Drive-ins, and Dives", and now he hosts "Guy's Grocery Games" on the Food Network. 

https://www.foodnetwork.com/profiles/talent/guy-fieri

https://www.foodnetwork.com/shows/guys-grocery-games

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
